>
[Hardy Traveler](/Feats.aspx?ID=4486) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 65 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

There’s no journey too far or burden too heavy when you have friends at your side or hope within your heart. Increase your maximum and encumbered [Bulk limits](/Rules.aspx?ID=188) by 1. In addition, you gain a +10-foot circumstance bonus to your Speed during overland travel.
name: Hardy Traveler
